title: Over 50 House Republicans back Banks' resolution opposing Iran nuclear deal amid Russia-Ukraine war

sentence: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-CA) rejected his appointment, along with the appointment of Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), leading McCarthy to withdraw all his nominations and boycott the committee.

title: Ginni Thomas pushed 'Stop the Steal' plans to Indiana Republican originally nominated to January 6 committee

sentence: House Judiciary Committee Ranking Member Jim Jordan (R-OH) has launched a new investigation into Facebook and Twitter’s impression of the Hunter Biden laptop story.

title: Exclusive — Peter Schweizer: ‘Slam Dunk’ Case to Indict Hunter Biden on Tax Evasion

sentence: Fellow far-right Congressman Jim Jordan of Ohio told National Review he supported the move to block Disney’s copyrights.
author: Bevan Hurley
title: Congressional Republicans may block Disney copyright after ‘Don’t Say Gay’ bill row
